segments.text: Mom , is there anything in the fridge I can eat before dinner ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There's some leftover pizza from last night .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Um , I think there may be some leftover lasagna from the other day .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do I have any other choices ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There might be some birthday cake left in the freezer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is everything in the fridge leftovers ? I hate leftovers !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can wash the vegetables and cut the chicken and I'll make dinner !
segments.speaker: S2
